name: Wack-A-Balloon
description:
Wack those balloons!

I couldn't decide on controls so you have a choice of two with a diiferent feel and learning curve in both.

Levels increment in difficulty and I'm not even sure the later ones are possible...

Let me know if they are please!

Mini prototype game created for the Wacka-a-Mole Quest as part of GameDev.Tv "Unity Challenge Club" (as of March 18th in early access, closed Beta Testing )
